TopicTitle: What does the new Mk1 Inline model look like?

Articles.Content: I didn't download KSP 1.0.3 yet, so I'd like to ask, A) what does the thing look like and ![B)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_cool.png) what do you people think of it?

There's a screen shot floating around somewhere of it...either in the announcement thread or the article.

I personally don't really see what the difference is vs the version 1.0 cockpit, or why it was changed. ![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif)

It'd be really nice to have a side-by-side comparison.

Edit: Here it is:

> 
> Here is the redone MkI Inline:
> ![8eyBGFu.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/8eyBGFu.jpg)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-23T06:10:44Z" title="06/23/2015 06:10  AM" data-short="9 yr">June 23, 2015</time> by Sidereus**

![screenshot83_zpsypltlvow.jpg](http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v499/swampmonster/Kerbal%20space%20program/screenshot83_zpsypltlvow.jpg)

I like it. It doesn't have the double bump look that it used to have and the textures have more obvious handholds.

Added- A quick comparison of the same aircraft with the new cockpit.

![comparison_zpskzjzefnd.jpg](http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v499/swampmonster/Kerbal%20space%20program/comparison_zpskzjzefnd.jpg)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-23T06:13:01Z" title="06/23/2015 06:13  AM" data-short="9 yr">June 23, 2015</time> by Reactordrone**

I like this model little more than the previous 1.0 version (looks more stock for me). But what about the second one? That old-styled cockpit doesn't fit the new design of plane parts. So I can't wait to see it remodeled. As well as small landing gear.
My only complaint is that you can't clip two of them together to get a decent looking realistic cockpit anymore.

> 
> My only complaint is that you can't clip two of them together to get a decent looking realistic cockpit anymore.

True but you could now try putting them side by side like the XB-42 Mixmaster ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

![original.jpg](http://mtdata.ru/u25/photo21CB/20152742353-0/original.jpg)
I had no issues with the old design, though I must admit I think I prefer the new look to the old one.
@pandoras kitten YES! The adapter thing as root part, probe core on its front, and the two cockpits side by side! The fuselage maybe a problem though, but I'll figure something out.
I like the newer version. Seems like air intakes got some refreshing too!

Is it just me, or does the HUD crosshair point slightly downward in the new model? Bit of a bummer if it does; the old version was a huge help with weapon systems and docking.

Otherwise, I prefer the updated cockpit.
